item.title: Transformers know more than they can tell -- Learning the Collatz sequence
item.description: arXiv:2511.10811v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We investigate transformer prediction of long Collatz steps, a complex arithmetic function that maps odd integers to their distant successors in the Collatz sequence ( $u_{n+1}=u_n/2$ if $u_n$ is even, $u_{n+1}=(3u_n+1)/2$ if $u_n$ is odd). Model accu...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> model, analysis, tool, large language model, arxiv | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
